original: Anidassanaappaṭighaṁ bhāvanāya pahātabbahetukaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca naanidassanaappaṭigho
nabhāvanāya pahātabbahetuko dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. (Saṅkhittaṁ.) Hetuyā cha,
Anidassanaappaṭighaṁ nabhāvanāya pahātabbahetukaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca nasanidassanasappaṭigho
nanabhāvanāya pahātabbahetuko dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. (Saṅkhittaṁ.) Hetuyā
